ComicInfo.Summary:
The End of Doc Samson!: Hulk and Samson tear into the Leader's gamma powered construct in front of the president. Samson takes a gamma blast that turns him back into his normal human form.
Heaven Is a Very Small Place!: The Hulk is fooled by an elaborate mirage in the desert.
